movie.title: Sarbjit
movie.plot: Biopic of Sarabjit Singh, a farmer residing at Bhikiwind, Punjab, near the Indo-Pak border, crossed the border after having a couple of drinks. However, he was mistaken to be an Indian spy and was sentenced with capital punishment.

events.title: Sarabjit Singh is beaten to death by Pakistani prisoners
Sarabjit Singh accidentally crosses the border into Pakistan and is arrested
Sarabjit Singh is sentenced to death by a Panistani court
